id.description: The unique identifier and name of the workflow.

description.description: The detailed description of the workflow.

transitions.description: The transitions available within the workflow.

id.description: The unique identifier of the transition.

description.description: The detailed description of the transition.

from.description: The statuses the transition can start from.

items.description: The statuses the transition can start from.

to.description: The status that the transition moves the issue to.

screen.description: The screen associated with the transition.

id.description: The unique identifier of the screen.

conditions.description: The conditions that must be met for the transition to occur.

type.description: The type of the transition rule.

configuration.description: The configuration of the transition rule (availability may vary).

validators.description: Validation checks performed during the transition.

configuration.description: The configuration of the validator (availability may vary).

postFunctions.description: Actions that occur after a transition.

type.description: The type of the post function.

configuration.description: The configuration of the post function (availability may vary).

statuses.description: The various statuses that the workflow can have.

id.description: The unique identifier of the issue status.

name.description: The name of the status in the workflow.

issueEditable.description: Indicates whether issues are editable in this status.

created.description: The date and time when the workflow was created.

updated.description: The date and time when the workflow was last updated.
